TORR is a relatively unknown black/thrash band from the Czech republic. They have Celtic Frost/Hellhammer feel, mixed with some thrashier elements. The drumming ranges from quick snare/bass to mid paced and to slow doomy parts. Not to make it sound unoriginal or uninspired, it isn't either of these. What we have is a very evil and nihilistic effort. Lyrics are about Satan, death, evilness, and hate. 
One of the unique things about them are some of the synths 

Credits go to canya
